channel.title: Thoughts on A Musings Coner
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on A Musings Coner

item.title: choices, decisions and goals
item.description: Choices you make for long term or short term, for next hour or next day, next week, or next year creates your personality. It is similar to how flowing river creates those rounds stones. Just one right or wrong decision doesn’t ensure whether you are going to be successful person or a failure. Its about making those similar right choices again and again will take you where you want to be… you have to imagine your future and then keep making choices which will keep ensuring that you reach more closer to that goal.

item.title: courage and confidence
item.description: To achieve anything big in life courage and confidence are two primary requirements. Everything else is secondary, which you can delegate someone else. Money you can lend, for skills and hard work you can hire someone, but courage & confidence have to be your own.

item.title: situations and answers
item.description: Many times in our life we face difficult situations and we look for answers outside, which are actually inside.

item.title: failures and trying
item.description: By failing again and again, I have tried all those paths which does not take me to success. Now I am only left with one path and I now where exactly it leads to.
